name: Snowspeeder Garrison
Lore: 'Snowspeeder attack plan devised by Commander Skywalker and Rebel tactician Beryl Chifonage. Single-file formation protects the squadron as the leader draws fire.',
Text: 'Deploys -3 to Hoth. Permanent pilots provide total ability of 6. While on Hoth, defense value +2, immune to attrition < 4, and may move as a ''react'' for +1 Force',
